data.enText: a set of five lines on which music is written
to break or damage sth by pushing it or hitting it from the outside
The side of the boat was staved in when it hit the rocks.
to prevent sth bad from affecting you for a period of time; to delay sth
data.chText: 暂时挡住（坏事）；延缓，推迟（某事物）

data.enText: to break or damage sth by pushing it or hitting it from the outside
The side of the boat was staved in when it hit the rocks.
to prevent sth bad from affecting you for a period of time; to delay sth
data.chText: 暂时挡住（坏事）；延缓，推迟（某事物）

tr: a crosspiece between the legs of a chair
one of several thin slats of wood forming the sides of a barrel or bucket
(music) the system of five horizontal lines on which the musical notes are written
burst or force (a hole) into something

example.ex: Many of the men had armed themselves with staves and pieces of iron.
example.tran: 很多人用棍棒和铁器将自己武装起来。

value.def: A stave is a strong stick, especially one that is used as a weapon.
A stave is the five lines that music is written on.

value.boxr_value: in AM, use 美国英语用 staff
